analysis.description:
ERCInterface (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol#162-169) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol#163-164)

DappleAirdrops.withdrawERC20Tokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_recipient,_value) (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol)

DappleAirdrops.issueRefunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- _addrs[i].transfer(toRefund) (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol#512-513)

DappleAirdrops.singleValueAirdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_recipients[i],_value) (/unique_chucks/4/0x4459b42d034330ecc1e4d604c0a5c855b857df2c.sol#542-543)

DappleAirdrops.multiValueAirdrop has external calls inside a loop:
